mapper.update: MERGE INTO PAYMENTS p USING DUAL ON (p.USER_ID = #{userId}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET p.CURRENT_BALANCE = p.CURRENT_BALANCE + #{coinAmount}, p.TOTAL_CHARGED = p.TOTAL_CHARGED + #{coinAmount}, p.LAST_CHARGE_DATE = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PAYMENT_ID, USER_ID, CURRENT_BALANCE, TOTAL_CHARGED, LAST_CHARGE_DATE) VALUES (PAYMENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{coinAmount}, #{coinAmount}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT CURRENT_BALANCE FROM PAYMENTS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
